Description: Up for auction is my lightly used MTM2. I just don’t play enough to justify all the gear I’ve accumulated over the years. I could measure the time playing this guitar as minimal. I just don’t play as much as I like collecting. Total time plugged in? Less than 40 hours over the last 10-12 years? The fixed bridge is on of my favorites, from any fixed bridge guitar I’ve ever owned. My second favorite thing is the recessed input jack. ...and finally, if I had it my way, every guitar would have a reverse headstock. It’s metal AF. The good Upgraded EMG Pickups. 85 in the bridge and a 60 in the neck. I think the 60 is the ceramic magnet version, but it’s been a while and I can’t remember. It screams. I like the 85 in the bridge. It’s a little more mellow but still fat. Dimarzio Strap Locks. I tossed the metal volume knob and installed a ‘Tone’ knob as a nod to EVH. It’s set so the top of the volume range is at...wait for it...’7’. The good with a little bad - Ibanez Jem case (middle lock is unlatched I don’t know the combo). Still a great case. The bad There’s a scratch in the clear coat on the top horn that doesn’t affect playability or anything, but it’s there. Missing the truss rod cover. Please ask questions, no returns and thanks for looking! I’ll ship FedEx and buyer to pay shipping.
Title: Black Mick Thomson Signature Ibanez MTM2 Upgraded Case EMG 60 and 85 Slipknot
